item.title: Report E-2025020417
item.description:
Report E-2025020417

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-04T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-27
  • City: FREDERICKSBURG
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A 5 gallon container of sodium hydroxide solution was punctured by an exposed nail in a pallet. The Veolia employee identified that the container was leaking and it was removed from the truck immediately. The spill was cleaned from the trailer floor and the dock floor. It is estimated that 3 ounces of material were spilled. The 5 gallon container and spill cleanup were overpacked into a 30 gallon drum without further incident. The pallet was cut into pieces sent for disposal as well.

item.title: Report I-2025020036
item.description:
Report I-2025020036

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-01T21:20:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-13
  • City: Roanoke
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PVS MINIBULK
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Driver hooked up a long run of hose and started offload. A fitting broke along the long run and 25-30 gallons of 93 sulfuric acid leaked onto asphalt. Driver stayed and cleaned up material. No injuries or exposure.
